permissions: Admins can create refusals. Non-admins can create refusals if they are the driver assigned to the shift, are a manager member of the trucker for the shift, or are a member of the broker for the shift.
side_effects: Creates a driver assignment refusal, updates the associated tender job schedule shift (may cancel the shift or unset the shift driver), and creates a refusal notification for the trucker’s default financial contact.
validation_notes: --tender-job-schedule-shift and --driver are required. The driver must be the currently assigned driver of the shift. The shift must be for a broker tender, must not have service events, and must not have time cards.
